text: Phoenix InfoNews Channel is a Hong Kong pay television news channel owned by Phoenix Television. It is the first channel to report news across the Greater China region, which includes Mainland China, Macau, Taiwan and Hong Kong. This channel was established on 1 January 2001. It delivers news and financial updates around the clock. Analysts also provide comments and analysis on current issues and topics. ==Related pages== *Phoenix Hong Kong Channel ==Other websites== * Category:Television stations Category:2001 establishments in Asia Category:Organisations based in Hong Kong
title: Phoenix InfoNews Channel
